events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store but I want to request a refund because it doesn’t fit properly and I am unhappy with the size.
The system has categorized this customer request under Refund due to keywords such as refund and return mentioned in the initial message.
Assigning this refund request to agent Sarah M. who handles all returns and refund cases within the team.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear the jacket doesn’t fit. Let me help you with your refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket has been used or damaged in any way?
The order number is #4321987. The jacket is brand new, I only tried it on once and it is completely unused with tags still attached.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund and provide you with a prepaid return label so you can send the jacket back at no cost.
That sounds great, I appreciate the quick help with the refund and the prepaid return shipping.
The refund process has been started, and you should receive the return label via email shortly. Once we receive the jacket, the refund will be processed within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the return shipping label and to see if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Yes, I got the label and have already sent the jacket back yesterday. Thank you for the follow-up and support.
We received the returned jacket and have completed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow a few days for it to appear on your statement.
We just sent you a short survey to gather feedback on your experience with our refund process. Your opinion is very valuable to us.
I completed the survey and was very satisfied with how quickly and smoothly the refund was handled. Thank you!
Closing this case after successful refund and positive feedback. If you need any more help in the future, please don't hesitate to contact us.
